description:
Grants 100% bonus Bloodpoints in all categories for all players this trial.
  • Stacks
name: Bloody Party Streamers
flavor: "A reminder of a bloody good time when people came together, but left screaming."

description:
Slightly lessens the Dark Mist.
  • Stacks.
name: Clear Reagent
flavor: "The Mist rolls in, traps all in Its deep madness. There is no running, no escape, no asylum, except for the clear waters of the pond lost in the forest." -Unknown, Notebook

description:
Slightly thickens the Dark Mist.
  • Stacks.
name: Faint Reagent
flavor: "Paralyzed, I stand in the cold as death lingers."

description:
Moderately thickens the Dark Mist.
  • Stacks.
name: Hazy Reagent
flavor: "The Mist is alluring, hypnotizing. I love It and fear It at the same time." -Donna's Sketchbook

description:
Greatly thickens the Dark Mist.
  • Stacks.
name: Murky Reagent
flavor: "The Mist seems to protect us from the beast, but it is a poison, a cancer, filling us with darkness and insanity." -Unknown, Notebook

description: Calls upon The Entity for the darkest moonlight.
name: New Moon Bouquet
flavor: "Better go back to sleep, there is no moon this night."

description: Calls upon The Entity for a dimmed moonlight.
name: Crescent Moon Bouquet
flavor: "The moon slowly fades into a smile: 'Don't worry, your secret is safe with me.' Or is it a grin?"

description: Calls upon The Entity for a brighter moonlight.
name: Quarter Moon Bouquet
flavor: "The old moon shows her face, looking down on the prey."

description: Calls upon The Entity for the brightest moonlight.
name: Full Moon Bouquet
flavor: "As the moon rises, the wolves howl, marking the beginning of the hunt."

description:
Slightly increases the chances of being sent to the MacMillan Estate when burnt.
  • Stacks.
name: MacMillan Ledger Page
flavor: "A torn and faded-out ledger page with unreadable information except for the MacMillan stamp."

description:
Considerably increases the chances of being sent to the MacMillan Estate when burnt.
  • Stacks.
name: Signed Ledger Page
flavor: "A faded-out ledger page referring to mining related equipment and other transactions. Signed by Archie MacMillan."

description:
Tremendously increases the chances of being sent to the MacMillan Estate when burnt.
  • Stacks.
name: MacMillan's Phalanx Bone
flavor: "MacMillan's skeletal remains were found in the basement of the mine's storehouse. His leg bones shattered into pieces and a mining hammer lying in his lap."

description:
Slightly increases the chances of being sent to the Autohaven Wreckers when burnt.
  • Stacks.
name: Shredded Plate
flavor: "A heavily rusted, bent and torn metal sheet."

description:
Considerably increases the chances of being sent to the Autohaven Wreckers when burnt.
  • Stacks.
name: Virginia Plate
flavor: "A rusted and bent license plate from the state of Virginia."

description:
Tremendously increases the chances of being sent to the Autohaven Wreckers when burnt.
  • Stacks.
name: Azarov's Key
flavor: "A broken key belonging to a vehicle of unknown brand. A keychain attached to it identifies the owner as a certain A. Azarov."

description:
Slightly increases the chances of being sent to Coldwind Farm when burnt.
  • Stacks.
name: Cattle Tag-28
flavor: "A bloodstained cattle tag identified with the number '28'."

description:
Considerably increases the chances of being sent to Coldwind Farm when burnt.
  • Stacks.
name: Coldwind Cattle Tag-81
flavor: "A bloodstained cattle tag identified with 'Coldwind Farm' and the number '81'."

description:
Tremendously increases the chances of being sent to Coldwind Farm when burnt.
  • Stacks.
name: Heart Locket
flavor: "A silver heart locket necklace. The simple interior is engraved with the following: 'E+M'."

description:
Slightly increases the chances of being sent to Crotus Prenn Asylum when burnt.
  • Stacks.
name: Lunacy Ticket
flavor: "A worn and faded-out ticket of paper with unreadable information."

description:
Considerably increases the chances of being sent to Crotus Prenn Asylum when burnt.
  • Stacks.
name: P.Elliott Lunacy Ticket
flavor: "A pink paper ticket identifying Philip Elliott as to be transferred to Crotus Prenn Asylum."

description: Tremendously increases the chances of being sent to Crotus Prenn Asylum when burnt.
name: Charred Wedding Photograph
flavor: "A burned portrait of a couple on their wedding day, the faces are completely charred and unidentifiable."

description:
Slightly increases the chances of being sent to Haddonfield when burnt.
  • Stacks.
name: Harvest Festival Leaflet
flavor: "A washed out informational leaflet for the '78 Haddonfield Harvest Festival. A large cartoon pumpkin is depicted on the front."

description:
Considerably increases the chances of being sent to Haddonfield when burnt.
  • Stacks.
name: Decrepit Clapboard
flavor: "A moldy and rotten beaded oak clapboard like the ones found on most houses of Haddonfield."

description: Tremendously increases the chances of being sent to Haddonfield when burnt.
name: Strode Realty Key
flavor: "A house key, mundane in appearance. A cardboard key-tag attached to it reads 'Strode Real Estate', followed by a handwritten address: '45 Lampkin Lane'."

description:
Slightly increases the chances of being sent to Backwater Swamp when burnt.
  • Stacks.
name: Fuming Cordage
flavor: "A burnt piece of marine rope still emitting a warm smoke."

description:
Considerably increases the chances of being sent to Backwater Swamp when burnt.
  • Stacks.
name: Fuming Welcome Sign
flavor: "A welcome sign made from a coarse piece of water polished cypress board. The sign is charred and still fuming."

description: Tremendously increases the chances of being sent to Backwater Swamp when burnt.
name: Grandma's Cookbook
flavor: "A leather-bound binder containing horrible human meat recipes such as the granny-slappin’ good chili."

description:
Slightly increases the chances of being sent to Léry's Memorial Institute when burnt.
  • Stacks.
name: Emergency Certificate
flavor: "A yellow carbon-copy certificate which admits a patient into immediate detention for emergency treatment. Copied information are smudged and unreadable."

description:
Considerably increases the chances of being sent to Léry's Memorial Institute when burnt.
  • Stacks.
name: Psychiatric Assessment Report
flavor: "A Psychiatric report signed by Herman Carter. It describes the memory deterioration of a patient and contains suggestions for next steps in the procedure."

description: Tremendously increases the chances of being sent to Léry's Memorial Institute when burnt.
name: Shattered Glasses
flavor: "Bent reading glasses. Speckles of dried blood can be seen on the shattered lens."

description:
Slightly increases the chances of being sent to Red Forest when burnt.
  • Stacks
name: Painted River Rock
flavor: "A slick and soft rock, polished by a stream. Decorated with red, black and white paint to depict a serious looking bear."

description:
Considerably increases the chances of being sent to Red Forest when burnt.
  • Stacks
name: Children's Book
flavor: "An ancient and decrepit story book, the pages of which have been lost to the elements."

description: Tremendously increases the chances of being sent to Red Forest when burnt.
name: The Last Mask
flavor: "A beautifully crafted tiger mask that would fit snug on a child's face. A faded note in Cyrillic letters can be found scripted on the back."

description: Tremendously increases the chances of being sent to Springwood when burnt.
name: The Pied Piper
flavor: "Betrayed by the town, he exacts his revenge by taking all their children."

description: Burning this offering grants you protection against the loss of your add-ons at the end of the trial.
name: Black Ward
flavor: "Hear my voice, spare my ways, protect me from the void."

description: Burning this offering grants you protection against the loss of your item and add-ons.
name: White Ward
flavor: "Keep me from evil, defend me, and pass away."

description: Tremendously increases the chances of being sent to Yamaoka Estate when burnt.
name: Yamaoka Family Crest
flavor: "You never leave a broken home. You only run away until the memories stop haunting you."

description:
Calls upon The Entity to reject all offerings that alter the chance of being sent to a specific realm.
This can only be canceled if four identical realm offerings are played.
name: Sacrificial Ward
flavor: “With blind eyes, we surrender our will and appeal to you for guidance.”

description: Tremendously increases the chance to be sent to Midwich Elementary School when burnt.
name: Mary’s Letter
flavor: "In my restless dreams, I see that town."

description: Tremendously increases the chances of being sent to Gideon Meat Packing Plant when burnt.
name: Jigsaw Piece
flavor: "Congratulations. You are still alive. Most people are so ungrateful to be alive. But not you. Not anymore."

description: Tremendously increases the chance to be sent to Hawkins National Laboratory when burnt.
name: Hawkins National Laboratory I.D.
flavor: "A soggy, bloodstained identification card with a serial number."

description: Tremendously increases the chance to be sent to Grave of Glenvale when burnt.
name: Dusty Noose
flavor: “Ask anyone trying to survive on this dust-choked land and they’ll tell you what a noose really is—a damn mercy.”

description:
A terrific stomach-churning cake to mark our three years together. Grants 103% bonus Bloodpoints in all categories for all players this trial.
  • Stacks
name: Gruesome Gateau
flavor:
“Happy Anniversary! Here's to our three years together!"
– The Dead by Daylight Team

description:
A spectacularly grim cake to mark our four years together. 1% tastier than a Gruesome Gateau. Grants 104% bonus Bloodpoints in all categories for all players this trial.
  • Stacks
name: Ghastly Gateau
flavor:
"Happy Anniversary! Here's to many more!"
- The Dead by Daylight Team
